text: @perlmutations @joncoopertweets Criminal trump enjoys the protests because it takes the narrative away from his lackluster response to covid19 and the 115,000+ deaths!! But now he is also failing the country with his response to the Black Lives Matter movement! He has failed America for 3and a half years!!
